entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 01:35 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: E 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
